name: Chat with Titanic
details: You can pick people and chat with people in my favorite movie Titanic.
Multiple users can access this application and communicate in real time.

name: JK Sports Club
details: This is about a sports club management and it's not a real website.
The website can do CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete).

name: Battleship Game
details: This is based on the battleship board game.
You can remotely play this game with people.
(You can see the speculation on the other side in real-time.)
